body_html:
When i run the three tasks on three different machines, the error does not occur.

@mrry I've now seen two issues where strange things happen when we are running more than one TF task on the same machine. I can't think of any way this might affect execution other than timing?

body:
> When i run the three tasks on three different machines, the error does not occur.

@mrry  I've now seen two issues where strange things happen when we are running more than one TF task on the same machine.  I can't think of any way this might affect execution other than timing?
